div.p:
By the end of this year I hope to issue 80 quarto-plates of Myoporinae,
B86.08.05. but the text will not appear in 1885,
No text to complement the plates was ever published. as I am also so much engaged for the forthcoming great Colonial Exhibition in London officially.
Colonial and Indian Exhibition, London, 1886. However the volume will be sent to you, so soon as it is out. Can I do for you anything particularly?
Let me hope, that you are happy and well.
